author: Alejandro Lazo
title: Is ‘Orange the New Blue’ for Southern California Republican Stronghold?
text:
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif.—Until recently, an upscale resort in Orange County, Calif., may have seemed an unlikely place for a boisterous gathering of 700 Democrats looking to unseat a longtime Republican congressman.
But Democrats say this wealthy, suburban county south of Los Angeles—the birthplace of Richard Nixon and longstanding symbol of Sun Belt conservatism—is in the midst of political transformation that could help them take back the U.S. House of Representatives.
...
